name: Kill The Dummy Boss Robots 3 (a jump shooter game)
name_original: Kill The Dummy Boss Robots 3 (a jump shooter game)
description:
Enjoy an epic action and be savage killer. This action packed platform shooter will give you -
=> 30 challenging levels with lots of robot enemies
=> Ancient environment
=> Collect diamonds to unlock next levels
=> Plenty of action, killing, shooting and challenges
=> Dumb proof control - anyone can play
=> A perfect time killer with loads of fun

So, download kill the dummy boss robots 3 today. Share with your friends to spread the fun :)

Happy killing ;)
